New Records: Luisangel Acuna hit his first MLB home run
Key Match Events: Luisangel Acuna hit a 109 mph rocket to left-center for a game-tying double
Luisangel Acuna added a single and a run scored later in the game
Pre-Game Insights: Francisco Lindor is sidelined with back soreness
Post-Match Reflections: Luisangel Acuna said he's calm and poised, and he belongs in the big leagues
Tylor Megill said Acuna is really confident and aggressive with the way he plays
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luisangel Acuna's performance showed why the Mets still believe they're OK even with Francisco Lindor sidelined
Others: Luisangel Acuna's brother, Ronald, is an injured Braves star and has been providing him with tips and confidence
Luisangel Acuna has been talking to Ronald regularly and getting assistance from him
